titleStmt.title: A letter from a gentleman in the country to his friend at London concerning a conference between some clergy-men at West-dereham in Norfolk, and some Quakers, December the 8th, 1698.
titleStmt.author: W. D.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for, and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
